title: Instructional Design for Enhancing Student Satisfaction in Blended Learning for Executive Education

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental mathematical knowledge and business-related experience
context.additional_context: Conducted in a digital device-provided environment, requiring design considerations for applicability to professionals' work contexts.

learning_goals: Learners can effectively apply self-directed learning strategies in blended learning environments.
Learners can evaluate the practicality of educational content and its applicability to future job roles in both online and offline instructional designs.
Learners can measure satisfaction based on the quality of instructor interaction and accessibility of educational materials in blended learning processes.

resources: Practical Mathematics Software for Hands-On Learning

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
